name: Skitty
description: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves all act as if they were normal-type.  Moves that inflict typeless damage do so as usual.  Moves of variable type, such as hidden power, are affected.  They otherwise work as usual, however; weather ball, for example, is always forced to be Normal, but it still has doubled power and looks different during weather.  As thunder wave is prevented by immunities, unlike most non-damaging moves, it does not affect ghost-type Pokémon under the effect of this ability.
abilities.description: All the Pokémon’s moves become the Normal type.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.effect: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
abilities.description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
